CustomField.description: Difference between the Collections Plan Start Date and End Date if the plan has an end date. Otherwise the difference between the Plan Start Date and Today.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(SFBD__StartDate__c), 0, IF(ISBLANK(SFBD__EndDate__c), TODAY() - SFBD__StartDate__c, SFBD__EndDate__c - SFBD__StartDate__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of days this Collections Plan has been open
CustomField.label: Days Open
